author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: أَيْ رَبِّ فَأَنْزِلْ عَلَيَّ وَعَلَى أَحِبَّتِي ما يَحْفَظُنا عَنْ شَرِّ الَّذِيِنَهُمْ أَعْرَضُوا عَنْكَ وَكَفَرُوا بِآياتِكَ.
translation: Send down, therefore, O my Lord, upon me and upon my loved ones that which will protect us from the mischief of those that have repudiated Thy truth and disbelieved in Thy signs.
